QuestData.Title: Secrets of the Botani
QuestData.Description: The botani must have stuck that big ogron there to protect something fancy. And what was that stumpy looking creature that it killed?$b$BThe botani are mean, but they have some fun toys. Maybe Kaz might know what it was.$b$bCan we go find Kaz now?$b$bI saw a compost heap up the south hill. If Kaz came looking for me I bet she would start there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Cutter to Kaz the Shrieker at the Compost Heap.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Kaz the Shrieker at the Compost Heap.
QuestData.RewardText: You found my Cutter! I shall gladly cut a thousand throats in your honor.
